title: Elon Musk Tells Joe Rogan the Next Tesla Roadster Will Fly—And AI Is Coming for Everyone
contentSnippet: Elon Musk covered AI bias, superintelligence, government waste, social media, and flying cars in marathon Joe Rogan interview.

title: 'We Fucked Up': MEXC Exec Promises Changes After Blowup Over Frozen Crypto Millions
contentSnippet: Crypto exchange MEXC says it's changing processes after an influencer's crusade to unlock his $3 million account.

title: Coinbase CEO Garners Praise, Pushback for Prediction Market Shoutouts in Earnings Call
contentSnippet: Brian Armstrong used Coinbase's Q3 earnings call to drop a few terms that prediction market users had bet on. The remarks got mixed reviews.

title: Court Denies Crypto Bank Custodia's Bid to Pry Master Account From Unwilling Fed
contentSnippet: Custodia said it may request a rehearing on the matter, after a panel of judges ruled 2-1 to affirm a district court’s prior ruling denying the crypto bank Fed access.

title: European Central Bank to 'Accelerate' CBDC Plans, Eyeing 2029 Digital Euro Rollout
contentSnippet: Europe could see the digital euro issued continent-wide as early as 2029, after a potential CBDC pilot in mid-2027.

title: Analyst Says Ethereum Is the Best Ecosystem and Ether Is Poised to Top $5,000
contentSnippet: Ether rose on heavier trading, then slipped after an upper-band rejection, leaving a tighter range and a clear set of checkpoints above and below.

title: California Regulator Fines Bitcoin ATM Operator Coinhub $675K for Violating Law
contentSnippet: California's Department of Financial Protection and Innovation fined Bitcoin ATM operator Coinhub $675,000 for violating digital assets law.

title: Chainlink's LINK Bounces 3.6% From Lows; Stellar Integration Expands RWA Reach
contentSnippet: Stellar is integrating Chainlink’s CCIP, Data Feeds, and Streams to enable tokenized asset flow across chains.

title: Tether Reports $10 Billion Profit in 2025 So Far—Here's How That Compares to the Big Banks
contentSnippet: Stablecoin giant Tether is making billions on its US Treasury reserves, putting it in league with some of Wall Street’s top earners.

title: Crypto Bank Custodia Suffers Another Court Rejection in Fed Master Account Pursuit
contentSnippet: The 10th Circuit Court of Appeals ruled against Custodia nine months after hearing arguments in the company's effort to secure a Federal Reserve master account.

title: Steak 'n Shake Bitcoin Burger Comes With Actual BTC as Firm Creates 'Strategic Reserve'
contentSnippet: Buy a Bitcoin burger, get BTC: Fold is offering Stake 'n Shake customers $5 in BTC if they nab the restaurant chain's crypto-burger.

title: The Bitcoin White Paper Offered a Blueprint for a More Reliable Financial System
contentSnippet: Satoshi Nakamoto’s Bitcoin white paper did not describe the end of Bitcoin’s development but the beginning, argues Voltage’s Bobby Shell.

title: Brazilian Bitcoin Treasury OranjeBTC Buys Back Stock Instead of BTC
contentSnippet: The publicly traded company started trading on Brazil's stock market B3 earlier this month.

title: REX IncomeMax ETF Taps Volatile Crypto Firms to Turn Price Swings Into Weekly Income
contentSnippet: The company is behind several crypto-focused ETFs.

title: 'Do Not Fear Ghosts of Fiat,' Says Bitcoin Policy Institute, as Bears Lurk at Resistance
contentSnippet: A fast rebound met heavier trading, but rallies stalled near resistance as advocates shared Halloween-themed comments on X.

title: ICP Rebounds Above $2.92 to Reverse Some Mid-Week Losses
contentSnippet: ICP bounces 1.04% to $2.94, reversing part of its recent decline as traders return and buying activity strengthens above key support.

title: BONK Regains Some Ground With 4.6% Gain
contentSnippet: BONK climbs above $0.00001380 resistance with 67% volume surge as meme token rallies toward new short-term highs.

title: Bitcoin Cash Breaks Above $550 as Volume Surges; Range Tightens Near Support
contentSnippet: A breakout above $550 followed a 1 a.m. UTC volume spike, then price cooled into a $553 to $556 band as traders watched whether $553.50 would hold.

title: Tether Profits Topped $10B in First Nine Months of Year; Starts Share Buyback Program
contentSnippet: The stablecoin issuer saw strong growth in the third quarter, reporting a $17 billion increase in circulating USDT and $135 billion exposure to U.S. Treasuries.

title: Filecoin Rises Over 4%, Rebounding From Thursday's Drop
contentSnippet: FIL has support at the $1.48 level and resistance at $1.52.
